p: Compounds 112 and 114 (2.0 mg each) were separately dissolved in 3% aqueous H 2SO 4 in a sealed vial and heated at 90 Â°C for 45 min. After cooling to room temperature and extraction with CHCl 3, the aqueous layer was repeatedly evaporated to dryness with the aid of MeCN. The residues were identified as l-(+)-rhamnose and d-(+)-glucose, respectively, by TLC and optical rotation upon comparison with authentic samples.
